g.text: Enable analytics to help improve the site
When disabled: Zero tracking, no scripts loaded
Route changes and browser back/forward tracked automatically
Analytics tracking only begins after explicit user permission.
No scripts load until permission granted via cookie banner.
All page views tracked with path and title when allowed
granted. SPA route changes and back/forward handled.
Site functions normally when analytics blocked by ad
blockers. No errors thrown, silent failure handling.
Visual indicator shows when data is being sent to

svg.text: Permission-first | Zero tracking without permission | Privacy mode | Async script loading | GA4 integration | Session persistence
